about_the_game:
Catnip Dream DEMO: A Purr-fect Leap into a Tipsy Cat's Dream Ń̶̦͔͠I̸̳̿Ǧ̴̣͑̑H̵̲͖̫͂͜͝T̸͙͙́̈́͘M̵͍͚̋A̸̝̝͆̓Ŗ̶̥̪͛E̵͈̅͒̊!

Jump into the Dreamy world of "CatNip Dream," a whimsical 2.5D platformer where you help a cat climb as high as possible. But beware, the path is full of very scary objects... Like CUCUMBERS!!!
These horrifying obstacles will make this dream a NIGHTMARE if you dare get too close!

This is the DEMO, you will be playing the first third of the main Level!
detailed_description:
Catnip Dream DEMO: A Purr-fect Leap into a Tipsy Cat's Dream Ń̶̦͔͠I̸̳̿Ǧ̴̣͑̑H̵̲͖̫͂͜͝T̸͙͙́̈́͘M̵͍͚̋A̸̝̝͆̓Ŗ̶̥̪͛E̵͈̅͒̊!

Jump into the Dreamy world of "CatNip Dream," a whimsical 2.5D platformer where you help a cat climb as high as possible. But beware, the path is full of very scary objects... Like CUCUMBERS!!!
These horrifying obstacles will make this dream a NIGHTMARE if you dare get too close!

This is the DEMO, you will be playing the first third of the main Level!
name: Catnip Dreams Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 48kHz WAVE format stereo DirectX 9.0c compatible sound board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10700k
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch surround 48kHz WAVE format DirectX 9.0c compatible sound board

short_description: This is the Demo for Catnip D̶r̶e̶a̶m Ń̶̦͔͠I̸̳̿Ǧ̴̣͑̑H̵̲͖̫͂͜͝T̸͙͙́̈́͘M̵͍͚̋A̸̝̝͆̓Ŗ̶̥̪͛E̵͈̅͒̊!!! You can play the first third of the main level!
